fields.name: package_id
fields.description: Unique id of the items package

fields.name: user__feedback
fields.description: True if user recieved a feedback message during the annotation

fields.name: data__text
fields.description: Haitian authorities say former Prime Minister Yvon Neptune.
fields.example: Calvin Klein Invisibles Hipster 3 Pack MultiColor Size Small US

fields.name: annotation__output
fields.description: Named enitity tags in IOB format for each token created by the user

fields.name: annotation__time
fields.description: Time user spent on annotating this item

fields.name: reference__output
fields.description: Reference named entity tags in IOB format for each token

fields.name: feedback__output
fields.description: Named entity tags in IOB format that were shown to the user as a feedback. Doesn't need to be the same as the one from the `reference__output` field

fields.name: test_group
fields.description: Defines the test conditions in which this annotation was created (e.g. low quality feedback)
